Azure Cosmos DB: Single-digit millisecond latency for reads andwrites anywhere in the world

Azure Table Storage: Single region with optional singlesecondary read region
Azure Cosmos DB: Turnkey distributions to all regions withautomatic failover

Azure Table Storage: Available for partition and row keyproperties only
Optimized for cold workloads (lowthroughput : storage ratio)
Azure Cosmos DB: Optimized for hot workloads (highthroughput : storage ratio)
